Pioneering private medicine since 2002.

What we do

Optimize your present health and oversee your future well-being so you can live your best life.

Our primary goal is to offer unparalleled access to concierge care and a robust expert network.

What we do

Optimize your present health and oversee your future well-being so you can live your best life.

Our primary goal is to offer unparalleled access to concierge care and a robust expert network.

Living your best life means having as few interactions with the traditional healthcare system as possible.

Continuing Education

A Culture of Continuous Learning

Our physicians regularly attend:
Lectures from experts at leading academic medical centers
Biweekly grand rounds led by world-renowned experts
Weekly practice-wide clinical sessions
Twice-monthly Private Medical’s Innovation Council
Private Medical’s Clinical Tools committee

Our Founder’s Story

The two biggest influences in my life were my parents: My father was the chief of laparoscopic surgery, and my mother is a Ph.D. in psychology. Their role in fixing bodies and minds and their commitment to improving lives drew me to medicine.

Read more

Why Physicians Join Private Medical

Private Medical physicians and staff are carefully chosen for their humanity, not just their pedigrees. We cultivate a culture of learning, collaboration and comprehensive care.

Dr. Christina Pham

Dr. Christina Pham

Dr. Christina Pham

Dr. Christina Pham

“Business and insurance minds design most health care organizations; Private Medical was built by physicians from the ground up who care for patients ‌exactly the way I do. This is hands down the best job in primary care.” 

Dr. Christina Pham, Internist

Since 2023
